net.alexanderdev.lightdrive.view

Interface Viewable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Display, Screen, Window

    public interface Viewable
    An interface which defines the common methods that all standard game Viewables should have.
    Since:
    Jan 19, 2016, 2:03:22 AM
    Author:
    Christian Bryce Alexander

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addFilter(Filter filter)
      Adds a Filter that will be applied to this Viewable's context after rendering.
      void clearFilters()
      Clears all added Filter's from this Viewable.
      void close()
      Cleans up any graphics resources associated with this Viewable, closes it, and terminates the program.
      Sprite getContext() 
      StateManager getManager() 
      java.awt.Rectangle getViewBounds() 
      int getViewHeight() 
      int getViewScale() 
      int getViewWidth() 
      void open()
      Prepares this Viewable's graphics and opens it up for game play.
      void removeFilter(Filter filter)
      Removes a Filter from being applied to this Viewable's context after rendering.
      void setManager(StateManager manager)
      Associates a new or custom StateManager with this game Viewable.

    • Method Detail

      • getManager

        StateManager getManager()
        Returns:
        The StateManager associated with this game Viewable

      • setManager

        void setManager(StateManager manager)
        Associates a new or custom StateManager with this game Viewable.
        Parameters:
        manager - The StateManager to associate

      • getViewBounds

        java.awt.Rectangle getViewBounds()
        Returns:
        A Rectangle starting at the origin, with the unscaled dimensions of this Viewable

      • getViewWidth

        int getViewWidth()
        Returns:
        The unscaled width of this Viewable

      • getViewHeight

        int getViewHeight()
        Returns:
        The unscaled height of this Viewable

      • getViewScale

        int getViewScale()
        Returns:
        The scale factor of this Viewable

      • getContext

        Sprite getContext()
        Returns:
        The Sprite context used for rendering

      • open

        void open()
        Prepares this Viewable's graphics and opens it up for game play.

      • close

        void close()
        Cleans up any graphics resources associated with this Viewable, closes it, and terminates the program.

      • addFilter

        void addFilter(Filter filter)
        Adds a Filter that will be applied to this Viewable's context after rendering.
        Parameters:
        filter - The filter to add

      • removeFilter

        void removeFilter(Filter filter)
        Removes a Filter from being applied to this Viewable's context after rendering.
        Parameters:
        filter -

      • clearFilters

        void clearFilters()
        Clears all added Filter's from this Viewable.
